RoaringFlame.title: Roaring Flame
RoaringFlame.desc: Discard every hex in your hand. Deal 30 damage for each hex discarded.

GleamingGolpe.title: Gleaming Golpe
GleamingGolpe.desc: Perform a swap. Inflict Burning on both tiles swapped.

ScorchingSpin.title: Scorching Spin
ScorchingSpin.desc: Gain 1 AP and deal 30 damage. Has Quickdraw if at least 9 tiles are burning.

CausticCastanet.title: Caustic Castanet
CausticCastanet.desc: Persist: Destory an adjacent burning tile to gain 2 AP next turn.
